ABDOMEN_PAIN: Have you expereinced any sort of pain in your stomach recently?
or anywhere in your abdomen region?
AGE: What is your age right now?
ANXIETY: A feeling of worry that you become tense?
Have you experienced feelings of anxiety recently?
APPETITE_LOSS: Do you feel like you don't have the motivation to eat?
ARM_PAIN: Do any of your arms hurt?
Do you feel pain in your arms recently?
Do your arms hurt unrelated to physical trauma?
BACK_PAIN: Have you been experiencing back pain?
BELLY_SWELL: Do you feel bloated in your stomach?
Like feelings of your belly swelling?
Does your stomach look more bloated than usual?
Do you feel like there is a buildup of fluids in your belly?
BLURRY: Does your vision feel blurry recently?
Where your sight has become blurry lately?
BLOOD_PRESSURE: Do you know your blood pressure?
Have you tested your blood pressure recently?
It would help me determine details on your condition :>
BLOOD_PRESSURE_SYSTOLIC: What is systolic your blood pressure? (---> X/Y)
It is the first number in your reading
Could you tell me your systolic your blood pressure? (---> X/Y)
BLOOD_PRESSURE_DIASTOLIC: What is diastolic your blood pressure? (X/Y <---)
It is the second number in your reading
Could you tell me your diastolic your blood pressure? (X/Y <---)
BONE_PAIN: I mean feelings of aching in your bones.
Have you experienced pain in your bones recently that is not related to physical injury?
CHEST_PAIN: Have you expereinced any form of pain in your chest region recently?
Have you felt a painful sensation in your chest lately?
CHEST_TIGHT: Where there are tense feelings in the chest region?
Have you expereinced any form of tightness or stiffness in your chest region recently?
CHILLS: Do you feel random chills going through your body even though the environment is warm?
COLDS: Are you down with a cold?
Do you have a runny nose?
CONFUSION: Do you sometimes feel confused out of nowhere from time to time?
Do you feel like you have a lack focus or mental clarity lately?
COUGH: Are you down with a cough?
CYANOSIS: Are your hands or fingertips bluish?
or have the shades of blue?
Do you show signs of cyanosis? where your finger tips have a shade of blue?
DIZZY: Have you felt lightheaded or dizzy?
DYSPHASIA: Have you been experiencing trouble swallowing your food?
Do you expereince disconformfort when swallowing?
Do you struggle to swallow food?
DYSPNEA: Do you feel breathless from time to time?
Do you feel like you are running out of breath alot?
Have you been experiencing feelings of breathlessness?
Where you feel like your body is suffocating from the lack of air.
FAINT: Have you blacked out or passed out?
FATIGUE: Do you feel tired for no reason?
Do you feel like you lack energy?
Making you weak to perform physical activities.
Have you felt fatigued or tired?
FEVER: Is your body temperature higher than (37.8°C/ 100°F)?
In other words do you have a fever?
HEADACHES: Does your head hurt like a headache or migraine?
HEARTBURN: Have you experience a heartburn recently?
Have you felt an uncomfortable burning senssation in your chest region recently? also known as heartburn.
HOARSENESS: Do you have a hoarse or weak scratchy voice lately?
Do you have a scratchy husky voice that is not your normal voice?
LEGS_SWELL: Do you feel like your legs are swelling?
Do you feel bloated on your legs?
Making it appear bloated than usual?
Do you feel like fluids are building up inside your legs making it swell?
MOUTH_PAIN: Do you feel pain in your mouth unrelated to physical injury?
MUSCLE_PAIN: Does your muscle hurts out of the blue that is not caused by physical injury?
NAUSEA: Have you felt nauseas that you feel like vomiting?
NECK_SHOULDER_PAIN: Do you experience pain in your neck or shoulder?
Have you felt pain in your neck and shoulders?
NECK_SWELL: Do you feel like your neck is swelling?
Do you feel bloated on your neck?
PALE_SWEAT: Have you woken up with a cold sweat?
Do you look pale and sweaty?
PHLEGM: Does your throat have phlegm or sputum?
Do you have mucus buildup in your throat?
also known as phlegm or sputum?
PHLEGM_CLEAR: Oh ok is the color clear?
Is the color of your phlegm clear?
PHLEGM_GREEN: Oh ok is the color green?
Is the color of your phlegm green?
PHLEGM_RED: Oh ok is the color red?
Is the color of your phlegm red?
in other words is there blood on it?
PHLEGM_WHITE: Is the color of your phlegm white?
R_INFECTIONS: Do you have a history with respiratory infections?
Like previous cases of other respiratory diseases?
SLEEP_HARD: Do you have trouble sleeping lately?
Do you struggle to sleep recently?
TACHYCARDIA: Do you expereince rapid heart palpitations?
TACHYPNEA: Have you been breathing rapidly lately?
Have you expereinced cases where you breath rapidly recently?
Do you feel like you have been abnormally breathing really fast?
URINE_BLOOD: Is there blood present in your urine recently?
Does your urine have the colors or shade of red?
WEAKNESS: Do you feel physically weak than usual not attributed to lack of sleep?
Do you feel weak even with a full night sleep?
WEIGHT: How much do you weigh right now?
How heavy are you right now?
Could you tell me your weight in kilograms?
